name: ondrejsynacek-com
description: Personal website hosted on ondrejsynacek.com. Includes build chain.

scripts.start: npm run build:dev && es-dev-server --root-dir dist/ --app-index index.html --watch open
scripts.build: npm run clean && node config/build.js && npm run copy
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development node config/build.js && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cp src/favicon.png dist/ && cp -R src/image dist/ && cp -R src/css dist/

author: Ondrej Synacek
